bin/abtsp-rai.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Asymmetric Bottleneck TSP heuristic using RAI heuristic.
00003  *
00004  * Runs the Bottleneck TSP heuristic on the given asymmetric input file.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 #include "tsp.h"
00012 #include "btsp.h"
00013 
00014 /* Global variables */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 char *tour_file = NULL;
00018 int iterations = -1;
00019 int supress_ebst = ARROW_FALSE;
00020 int solve_btsp = ARROW_FALSE;
00021 int lower_bound = -1;
00022 int upper_bound = INT_MAX;
00023 int basic_attempts = 1;
00024 
00025 /* Program options */
00026 #define NUM_OPTS 9
00027 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00028 {
00029     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00030         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00031     {'x', "xml", "file to write XML output to",
00032         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00033     {'T', "tour", "file to write tour to",
00034         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &tour_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00035     
00036     {'r', "iterations", "number of RAI iterations",
00037         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &iterations, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00038     {'b', "solve-btsp", "use BTSP formulation in RAI algorithm",
00039         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &solve_btsp, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00040         
00041     {'e', "supress-ebst", "supress binary search",
00042         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_ebst, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00043         
00044     {'l', "lower-bound", "initial lower bound",
00045         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lower_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00046     {'u', "upper-bound", "initial upper bound",
00047         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &upper_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00048     {'a', "basic-attempts", "number of basic attempts",
00049         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &basic_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE}
00050 };
00051 char *desc = "Bottleneck traveling salesman problem (BTSP) solver";
00052 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options]";
00053 
00054 /* Main method */
00055 int 
00056 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00057 {   
00058     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00059     int i, u, v, cost;
00060 
00061     arrow_problem problem;
00062     arrow_problem_info info;
00063     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00064     arrow_btsp_result result;
00065     arrow_tsp_rai_params rai_params;
00066     arrow_btsp_params btsp_params;
00067     
00068     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00069     double end_time;
00070     
00071     arrow_util_random_seed(0);
00072     
00073     /* Read program arguments */
00074     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00075         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00076         
00077     /* Try and read the problem file */
00078     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00079         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00080     if(problem.symmetric)
00081     {
00082         arrow_print_error("Solver only works on asymmetric matrices.");
00083         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00084     }
00085     
00086     /* Gather basic info about the problem */
00087     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, &info))
00088         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00089     printf("Num costs in problem: %d\n", info.cost_list_length);
00090     printf("Max cost in problem:  %d\n", info.max_cost);
00091     
00092     /* Determine if we need to call the BBSSP to find a lower bound */
00093     if(lower_bound < 0)
00094     {
00095         lower_bound = info.min_cost;
00096         // TODO: Insert call to a ABTSP lower bound here
00097     }
00098     if(info.max_cost < upper_bound)
00099     {
00100         upper_bound = info.max_cost;
00101     }
00102     
00103     /* Set up RAI parameters */
00104     if(iterations < 0) iterations = problem.size * problem.size;
00105     rai_params.iterations = iterations;
00106     rai_params.solve_btsp = solve_btsp;
00107         
00108     /* Setup necessary function structures */
00109     if(arrow_btsp_fun_basic(ARROW_TRUE, &fun_basic) != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00110         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00111     #define SOLVE_STEPS 1
00112     arrow_btsp_solve_plan steps[SOLVE_STEPS] = 
00113     {
00114        {
00115            ARROW_TSP_RAI,                   /* TSP solver */
00116            (void *)&rai_params,             /* TSP solver parameters */
00117            fun_basic,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00118            basic_attempts                   /* attempts */
00119        }
00120     };
00121     
00122     /* Setup BTSP parameters structure */
00123     arrow_btsp_params_init(&btsp_params);
00124     btsp_params.confirm_sol         = 0;
00125     btsp_params.supress_ebst        = supress_ebst;
00126     btsp_params.find_short_tour     = 0;
00127     btsp_params.lower_bound         = lower_bound;
00128     btsp_params.upper_bound         = upper_bound;
00129     btsp_params.num_steps           = SOLVE_STEPS;
00130     btsp_params.steps               = steps;
00131     
00132     /* Solve BTSP */
00133     arrow_btsp_result_init(&problem, &result);
00134     if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&problem, &info, &btsp_params, &result))
00135     {
00136         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP on file.\n");
00137         ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00138         goto CLEANUP;
00139     }
00140     end_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00141     
00142     if(result.found_tour)
00143     {
00144         /* Sanity check */
00145         for(i = 0; i < problem.size; i++)
00146         {
00147             u = result.tour[i];
00148             v = result.tour[(i + 1) % problem.size];
00149             cost = problem.get_cost(&problem, u, v);
00150             
00151             if(cost > result.obj_value)
00152             {
00153                 arrow_print_error("Found tour is no good! WTF?\n");
00154                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d, ", u, v, cost);
00155                 ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00156                 goto CLEANUP;
00157             }
00158             else if(cost < 0)
00159             {
00160                 arrow_print_error("Negative edge in tour! WTF?\n");
00161                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d, ", u, v, cost);
00162                 ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00163                 goto CLEANUP;
00164             }
00165             
00166             result.tour_length += cost;
00167         }
00168         printf("Tour passes sanity check\n");
00169         
00170         /* Tour output */
00171         if(tour_file != NULL)
00172         {
00173             FILE *tour;
00174             char comment[256];
00175         
00176             if(!(tour = fopen(tour_file, "w")))
00177             {
00178                 arrow_print_error("Could not open tour file for writing");
00179                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00180                 goto CLEANUP;
00181             }
00182         
00183             sprintf(comment, "ABTSP Tour; Length %.0f, Max Cost %d.",
00184                 result.tour_length, result.obj_value);
00185         
00186             arrow_util_write_tour(&problem, comment, result.tour, tour);
00187         
00188             fclose(tour);
00189         }
00190     }
00191     
00192     /* Final output */
00193     arrow_btsp_result_print_pretty(&result, stdout);
00194         printf("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", lower_bound);       
00195     
00196     printf("Total Time: %.2f\n", end_time);
00197     
00198     /* Xml output */
00199     if(xml_file != NULL)
00200     {
00201         FILE *xml;
00202         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00203         {
00204             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00205             ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00206             goto CLEANUP;
00207         }
00208         
00209         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_btsp problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00210         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00211         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00212         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00213 
00214         arrow_btsp_result_print_xml(&result, xml);
00215         
00216         fprintf(xml, "<total_time>%.5f</total_time>\n", end_time);
00217         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_btsp>\n");
00218         
00219         fclose(xml);
00220     }
00221     
00222 CLEANUP:
00223     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&result);
00224     arrow_btsp_params_destruct(&btsp_params);
00225     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00226     arrow_btsp_params_destruct(&btsp_params);
00227     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem); 
00228     return ret;
00229 }
